name: gaia online guild corrector
description: just makes the rest of the guild home page look nicer, can be used to blend in the whole home page seamlessly if you like
additional_info:
will most likely make adjustments to this in the near future 
things like the guild mod panel have got color in them now, the side of the guild is larger to make it easier to see things and the color has been added to the side as well 
works great with gaia upgrade and other scripts i have wrote 
DOES NOT affect any other scripts as far as i can tell. if it does let me know ok so i can fix it 
if you dont like the color feel free to find the specific areas and change them
